comments: I had this professor for three seperate classes; Intro to Theatre, Speech, and Page to Stage. He is the best theatre professor the department has to offer. I loved his classes no books just his knowledge from yrs of experience. Very people oriented, never in a bad mood. Great human being.

This professor is cool, but sometimes he gets off topic too much, I know its speech and all but still. Anyway, I realize that his grading is kind of unfair and his remarks on your presentation depends on what mood he\'s in. Be careful!
He was a very enjoyable professor and i had a great time in his class. I took him for a summer session, hes easy going and jokes alot, but i learned alot.
He was great! Very helpful, very animated, very encouraging, very laid back. If you dread speeches like I did i recommend DEF taking this classand you\'ll end up loving it!!
Great teacher, I have no complaints. He is very helpful, and understanding. Very funny and enjoyable. Take his class he is the BEST.
